long_description: The Princeton Tec Bot headlamp is small and simple, and ready for your outdoor family adventures. 2 bright LEDs throw light up to 25m on high and 15m on low; LEDs output 15 lumens. Built with the same ruggedness and reliability as other Princeton Tec headlamps. 2 AAA batteries (included) provide up to 4.5 hrs. of use on high and 9 hrs. on low; battery door screws shut to ensure kids don't open it accidentally. Push-button on/off switch is easy to operate. Princeton Tec Bot headlamp has fun colors and graphics that appeal to kids. IPX4 water resistance provides protection against sprayed water.
short_description: The Princeton Tec Bot headlamp is small and simple, and ready for your outdoor family adventures.
